name: A Night at the Bee Hive #meditationsgames
name_original: A Night at the Bee Hive #meditationsgames
description:
made by Lex Rhodes for http://meditations.games/

...the launcher is busted for the time being, so i uploaded my meditation here for anyone who wants to play! cheers!

♬♪♫♩♬ My voice might squeak and my cheeks might blush like the coy-otes howl and the sky does flush, but I've got these arms that fit 'round your shoulders and I'll keep you toasty warm as the winds blow colder. Oh the sweetest little birdy I ever done see, won't you jack-elope with me? ♬♪♫♩♬
